article_node.title: 'Very in your face': Fox presses Kristi Noem about migrant arrests near Newsom's speech
article_node.summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom is leading a redistricting initiative in response to Texas Republicans' efforts to disenfranchise Democratic voters, framing it as a necessary pushback against President Trump's actions. Amidst this political backdrop, Trump has deployed federal agents in Los Angeles, prompting accusations of inciting violence and authoritarianism. Polling suggests that Trump's handling of crime has gained him public support, contrasting sharply with President Biden's declining approval ratings on the issue. As tensions rise, Newsom's strategy aims to galvanize Democratic voters and challenge the GOP's redistricting efforts.
